explains: n. 角落；隐匿处；核武器；凹处

sentences.en: We found a seat in a little nook, and had some lunch.
sentences.cn: 我们在一个小角落找了个位子，吃了点午饭。

sentences.en: Boxes are stacked in every nook and cranny at the factory.
sentences.cn: 箱子叠放在工厂的每个角落。

sentences.en: They wandered everywhere, they looked into every nook and corner, house and theater.
sentences.cn: 他们到处游荡，他们看遍了每一个角落，房子和剧院。
